title: Urgent Opening For Jr. Logistic Manager
tagsAndSkills: Inventory Management,Logistics Management,Supply Chain Operations,Warehouse Operations,Communication Skills,Supply chain,Supply,Logistics
jobDescription:
Job Description for Jr. Logistics Manager :


We are looking for a young, active, self driven Logistics Manager with strong communication skills and logistics management experience.


Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Good knowledge of Supply Chain activities for Domestic and International shipments
  • Experience in handling & managing warehouse
  • Should have good knowledge in legal documentation such as (Proforma invoice, Sales Order, Purchase Order, Tax invoicing-way bill etc)
  • Knowledge of GST System
  • Shall be able to communicate with Internal team (Sales, finance, Project & Service team)
  • Able to handle Inhouse support staff ,external agency & Logistics handler
  • Shall have good negotiation skills
  • Should have good knowledge of customs procedures for International shipments
  • Proficient in MS Office , G-suits and Inventory management software
  • Shall have good communication skills as the role involves handling MNC clients & reputed logistics companies
  • Shall be Good team player
  • Team management skills
  • Excellent Communication skills

  • Designation: Jr. Logistics Manager
  • No of Vacancies: 1
  • Qualification: Any Graduate (Specialized course done in logistics or SCM will be an added advantage)
  • Branch: Navi Mumbai Kharghar
  • Male/Female: Both
  • Job Location: Navi Mumbai Kharghar
  • In house/site work: In houseÂ 
  • Fresher/Experience: Experience ( Min 3 to 6 years of experience in Logistics Profile )
  • Preferred candidate: From Navi Mumbai or nearby location only

Interested candidates can share resume on careers@reliserv.in or call us on 7304995406.
